events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred last night involving their car being hit by another driver at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report describing damage due to a car collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle the case and contact the customer for additional details concerning the vehicle accident.
A formal acknowledgment was sent to the customer confirming that their vehicle accident claim is now in process.
The customer was asked to submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed.
All requested documents, including the police report and photos, were submitted by the customer to support the claim.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and police report to verify the circumstances of the vehicle accident.
The investigation concluded with validation of the accident details and confirmation that the damages are covered under the policy.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer outlining the reimbursement amount for vehicle repair expenses.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the offer and quick handling.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department, confirming all conditions were met for payment issuance.
Payment for the vehicle repairs was issued to the customerâ€™s nominated bank account as per the approved settlement amount.
The claim case was closed after payment issuance and confirmation that the customer received funds without further issues.
All claim documentation and correspondence were archived for record-keeping and future reference related to the auto accident claim.
